abstract: Country codes owned by governments that have two-letter combinations at the end of their sites, like the “.me” for Montenegro, are attracting purchases by foreign companies.
snippet: Country codes owned by governments that have two-letter combinations at the end of their sites, like the “.me” for Montenegro, are attracting purchases by foreign companies.
lead_paragraph: Logging on to Facebook? You can use the social networking site’s full Web address, or you can type www.fb.me.

headline.main: For Countries That Own Shorter Web Site Suffixes, Extra Cash From Abroad
headline.print_headline: For Countries That Own Shorter Web Site Suffixes, Extra Cash From Abroad

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Internet Corp for Assigned Names and Numbers
